resources.string: Why is the spider the neediest animal in the world?\\nBecause she is an arachneedyou.
Why doesn\'t the pine tree get lost in the forest?\\nBecause it has a pine cone.
What was a pagodeiro doing in church? He went to sing PÁ GOD.
Why was Napoleon always called to parties?\\nBecause he was GOOD AT PARTY
What is the king of cheeses? It\'s the cottage cheese.
Why doesn\'t the old lady wear a watch?\\nBecause she is Lady.
When did Americans first eat meat? time?\\nWhen did Cristovão Com Lombo arrive.
Here the joker will be shown
